document_data.name: Rairdrun Hill
document_data.mainbody: '''Rairdrun Hill''' was the name of a hill near the [[Dragon Coast]] in the mid–8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|767}}, the stretch between Rairdrun Hill and [[Oggle's Stream]] was known as [[the Dead Place]], because of a prowling phantom known as [[Saeraede Lyonora|the Slayer]], which had killed almost everything larger than a [[mouse]].
